page.title: 17A CHILD'S DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: I am Stephen Tall and I am{7 years} old. I get up at{7.o'clock,}then I get dressed. Then I get my{swimming}kit ready. Next I get my{breakfast}then I go back upstairs and brush my teeth. Then I go downstairs and get ready, I make my sandwiches then I go to{ {school.}At 9.o'clock the{bell}goes and I go into class and we do the{ {register.}Then we do our work, two tables do{language}the other two tables do{number.}After{assembly,}we finish at half past ten. We go out to play.At quarter to eleven we go in and finish off our work until 12.o'clock. We go in for{dinner,}after dinner we go out to play for an hour. We go in for soundgroups then go back to class. We have the{register}then we do some more work until 3.o'clock. We have a story then we go{home.} (By Stephen Tall age 7 years)
